title: T206 Walter Johnson Hands at Chest Polar Bear SGC 1.5

posts.post_title: T206 Walter Johnson Hands at Chest Polar Bear SGC 1.5
posts.post_content:
FS: T206 Walter Johnson Hands at Chest SGC 1.5 - Polar Bear. Has some very minor tobacco staining on bottom and a hard to notice wrinkle near his mouth. Main reason for the grade being a 1.5 is the miscut Polar Bear back, as two backs are visible. 

$1350 delivered no fee
